divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend greg and i were out on my deck one day when we noticed a light moving from left to right above the tree line. about 20 minutes later we both witnessed 2 black helicopters appear and begin circling the object.after a few minutes of this the mysterious light simply vanished.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Millvale
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 2 black helicopters were circling object for a good 35 minutes
